casebody.data:
BERG SHIPBUILDING COMPANY, A CORPORATION, AND GEORGE NELSON, SURETY FOR THE BERG SHIPBUILDING COMPANY, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45256] [103 C. Cls. 102;

326 U. S. —]

Government contract; corporation dissolved under State statute for failure to pay license fee. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 15,1945.
